modmenu.descriptionTranslation.preventer: A mod that prevents you from doing dumb things by accident
text.preventer.moduleUseInfo: Below you can toggle Module Notifications, which will be displayed if a module prevented an action
tooltip.preventer.noPath: Prevents you from creating path blocks
tooltip.preventer.noGlowBerrieHarvest: Prevents you from harvesting Glow Berries
tooltip.preventer.noSweetBerrieHarvest: Prevents you from harvesting Sweet Berries
tooltip.preventer.onlyMatureCropHarvest:
Prevents you from harvesting 
(breaking) non-mature crops
config.preventer.onlyMatureCropHarvest.t: §4The targeted crop is not yet mature§4
tooltip.preventer.lowDurabilityProtectio:
Prevents tools & weapons from 
breaking due to low durability
config.preventer.lowDurabilityProtection: §4Tool usage prevented due to low durability§4
tooltip.preventer.lowDurabilityProtectio: Specify the lowest durability for tools & weapons
tooltip.preventer.noZombifiedPiglinPunch: Prevents you from attacking Zombified Piglins
tooltip.preventer.noTrappedChestOpening: Prevents you from opening trapped chests
tooltip.preventer.preventBuddingAmethyst: Prevents you from breaking budding amethyst blocks
tooltip.preventer.preventRocketUse:
Prevents you from using firework
rockets while not flying
config.preventer.rocketInMainHand: Prevent rocket use in main hand
tooltip.preventer.preventEndCrystalHitti: Prevents you from hitting end crystals
tooltip.preventer.preventBedUse: Prevents you using beds in the End or Nether dimension
tooltip.preventer.preventCoralPlace: Prevents you from placing corals out of water
config.preventer.preventCoralPlace.text: §4Out of water coral placing was prevented§4
tooltip.preventer.preventWaterPlace: Prevents you from placing water in the nether
tooltip.preventer.preventStemBreaking: Prevents you from breaking pumpkin/melon stems
tooltip.preventer.preventItemFrameBreaki: Prevents you from breaking item frames (and glowing item frames)
tooltip.preventer.preventToolDropping: Prevents you from dropping tools and swords out of your hotbar
tooltip.preventer.preventGlassBreaking: Prevents you from breaking glass and glass panes
tooltip.preventer.hideTotem: Hides totems of undying in the offhand
tooltip.preventer.preventRenamedBlockPla: Prevents you from placing renamed blocks
tooltip.preventer.preventRenamedItemEati: Prevents you from eating renamed food
